items.name: Remove ALL "Weed" Verbiage from Site
items.description: Search reggieanddro.company.site for "weed", "marijuana", "pot", "cannabis" (where not legally required)

items.name: Add Product Ingredients to ALL Edibles
items.description: Gummies, brownies, drinks, tinctures — full ingredient lists
items.action: Add "Ingredients: [list]" in product descriptions with allergen warnings

items.name: Upload Product Photos to ALL Products
items.action: Minimum 3 photos per product (product, packaging, close-up)

items.name: Hide Accessories Temporarily
items.description: Bank prefers pure hemp focus during review
items.action: Smoking accessories, grinders, rolling papers → set to "hidden" in Lightspeed

items.name: DNS Flip Prep (DO NOT EXECUTE YET)
items.description: Contact Leanne Fonte for SSL support
items.action: Get Cloudflare CNAME/A record instructions for reggieanddro.com
